data.title: Matt's Place Foundation
data.text:
Providing Hope and Housing For Families Living With ALS.

Join Us at the Summit

This is a day of innovation and connection focused on shaping a more sustainable and accessible tomorrow through construction, design, and adaptive technology. It will be hosted at WSU Spokane. We will showcase innovative products from across the nation and engage with industry experts to redefine the future of design and living spaces.

Matt's Place Foundation Receives a $100,000 Grant from ALSFAC We Care For “Hope & Housing” ALS Home Remodel Video Series.

Hope & Housing ALS Home Renovation Series

The Hope & Housing ALS Home Renovation Series is meant to serve as a guide for remodeling your home for people living with ALS. The series will cover a range of topics, including accessibility home modifications, assistive technology, and home care services.

Matt’s Place Spokane Home

”The Ultimate ALS Home”

A groundbreaking home specifically designed to cater to the unique needs of the ALS community. This state-of-the-art home seamlessly blends functionality, comfort, and sustainability. Offering an accessible and empowering living environment for individuals with ALS and their families.

Improving the lives of families living with ALS in Washington, Idaho, and Montana Areas.

Hope

Our motto is “Uncrushable Spirit,” coined by Matt himself after writing an email to his loved ones sharing his diagnosis. Everything starts with “Hope.”

Housing

We have successfully built two homes for families living with ALS. These families live in our houses for free, never having to pay a single cent for our homes.

Assistance

We specialize in assisting with house remodels, including ramps, door widening, flooring, and bathroom remodels. We also assist in providing technology for pALS.

The Mission:

Let’s Serve All 50 States.

Matt's Place Foundation is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization created to assist people living with ALS and their families. Its ultimate intention is to provide hope, housing, and assistance to families living with ALS.

“100% Of Your Donations Go To Support Families Living With ALS”

Matt’s Place Press

"The Ultimate ALS Home Win's The Prestiges AZURE Award For "Concept"

"The Series will cover a range of topics, including accessibility home modifications, assistive technology, and home care services."

“Supporting Those With ALS”

Events

Matt's Place Foundation ALS Golf Classic

Join us at MeadowWood Golf Course for our annual ALS Golf Classic Tournament, a fun-filled day of laughs, games, and fundraising.

Matt's Place Summit: Design Showcase

We will showcase innovative products from across the nation and engage with industry experts to redefine the future of design and living spaces.

Matt’s Story.

Former Marine

As a former Marine who revels in the challenge of a seemingly impossible task, Matt wanted to be an inspiration for others battling ALS. Soon after his diagnosis, Matt came up with a slogan: “Uncrushable Spirit.” Matt embodies that philosophy every day. Although his diagnosis is a setback, he will not give up and will continue to look for blessings every day in his life.

"I expect to pass through this world but once. Any good thing, therefore, that I can do, or any kindness that I can show to any fellow creature, let me do it now. Let me not defer or neglect it for I shall not pass this way again."

— ETTIENNE DE GRELLET
